heading: HR00839
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE  APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION FOLLOWING THE ACCIDENT IN TANAY RIZAL OF THE PANDA COACH BUS LEADING TO THE DEATH OF STUDENTS OF THE BESTLINK COLLEGE AS WELL AS TO IMPROVE THE POLICY AND REGULATIONS IN THE CONDUCT OF OUT-OF-SCHOOL ACTIVITIES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00839
